content: This is usually a Windows problem. Have you checked to see what the default app is for html? That has often been the issue.
creator: davidsk

content: It appears to be malformed HTML. I suggest you click the shift key and then the reply button to allow replying in plain text.
creator: davidsk

content: Try this: highlight 'junk' in unified folders, rightclick and select 'properties' and then select 'choose' to see which folders are included.
creator: davidsk

content:
Hello there We have read the messsge We try to help

The common message for sending an email with an attachment that is downloaded is too large to process, for example for the mail server service.

Whether this service takes too long for this action.

This is not able to process this and you will receive the above-mentioned message on your screen, just like yours.


Greetings Firefox volunteer
creator: googlethunderbird

content:
Hello there


To start with, you can indeed check whether the outgoing Smtp configuration is okay.

try to send all data to a backup file first so that your data is safe before you start

After that contact me.

we could run and find a solution together to set the time out server.

Greetings Firefox volunteer.
creator: googlethunderbird

content:
Anzitutto: Il sito support.mozilla.org è solo un'area di discussione a disposizione degli utenti Mozilla; Non è un servizio di supporto tecnico, che del resto sarebbe insostenibile per un programma gratuito.

Per gli account POP ci sono discrete possibilità che la posta sia recuperabile (le configurazioni e gli account no). Fai subito un backup del profilo -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo

Poi prenditi un po' di pazienza e fai l’elenco di tutti i file e le cartelle contenute nel profilo all'interno di una cartella chiamata semplicemente mail e riporta tutto in questa discussione. Se ci sono dati privati oscurali il necessario.

Per farti una idea, il percorso di recupero dati che voglio suggerirti è grosso modo questo -> https://radiofaro.neocities.org/kb/index/002 ma prima bisogna vedere cosa effettivamente c'è nel profilo.
creator: @next

content: I don't understand the issue. You receive emails from everyone except one person? What do you mean by 'a code has been sent there'? Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: I do not get e-mails from anyone, the code I mentioned was an example of one I definitely should have got. When you want to change a password, they ask you to type in a code that they send you by e-mail. I did not get it.
creator: leananger27

content: I suggest you check your online account to see if the code is there. Otherwise, I suggest contacting the email provider.
creator: davidsk

content: I don't know your problem specifically, but I suggest first verifying that Thunderbird is connected to a dictionary. click 'new message' and in text area, right click and select 'languages' to check. If not, this link may assist: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1389757
creator: davidsk

content: You might try the 'mailmerge' addon, and experiment with its options. My other suggestion is to consider using a mailing service, such as Mailchimp, as it has a free service that may fill your needs.
creator: davidsk

content:
Basta tenere fermo il puntatore del mouse sul link ed in basso vedrai l'URL di destinazione.

Il collegamento però potrebbe anche essere fatto tramite pulsanti HTML o script, per cui non è detto che il metodo sopra funzioni sempre.
creator: @next
